name: iOe
0:
”Alexa, turn on hallway light”
”Alexa, turn off hallway light”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Currently this skill supports iO.e smart plugs and smart bulbs. If you have any problems, please contact us at ioe@vip.126.com

|||NEW||| 
You can change the color and temperature of your lights now!
Try saying:
* Alexa, set bedroom light to green.
* Alexa, set bedroom light to cool white.
 |||NEW|||
iO.e offers the most comprehensive voice controlled smart home experience with Alexa. Control your home lighting and other devices hands free. Just say it, iO.e will obey. 

Here’s a step by step guide:
(1). Download our "iO.e" app in Google Play or iOS App Store;
(2). Launch the app and register a new account (or login if you’re already registered);
(3). Turn on iO.e smart devices and connect them with “iO.e” app;
(4). IMPORTANT: You can rename the devices with iO.e App. So if you rename a smart bulb “Livingroom Light”, then Echo will get that same name after discovered the devices in Step 9;
(5). Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" app;
(6). Search the Alexa Skills directory for "iO.e";
(7). Click Enable skill of "iO.e", then input your account username, password and region on the linking page;
(8). Talk to Echo "“Alexa,discover devices.”. Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed";
(9). Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices.

Here are the voice commands iO.e has:

Lights:
* Alexa, turn on my livingroom light
* Alexa, turn off my livingroom light
* Alexa, dim my livingroom light
* Alexa, brighten my livingroom light
* Alexa, set the livingroom light to 20 percent

Plugs:
* Alexa, turn on my plug
* Alexa, turn off my plug
